Reference

All functions

facet_by()

Specify a field to facet by

facet_date_range()

Specify a date range facet

facetable_fields()

Get a list of facetable fields

filter_category()

Filter categories

filter_country()

Filter countries

filter_duplicate()

Filter duplicate

filter_entityid()

Filter entityid

filter_georssid()

Filter georssid

filter_guid()

Filter guid

filter_indexdate()

Filter indexdate

filter_language()

Filter language

filter_pubdate()

Filter pubdate

filter_source()

Filter source

filter_text()

Filter based on text found in title, description, or text, including translations

filter_tonality()

Filter tonality

finder_connect()

Set connection details to Finder engine

get_query()

Get the query string for a query

list_to_df()

Convert documents list to data frame

n_docs()

Get how many documents were returned

query_facet()

Initialize a document fetch query

query_fetch()

Initialize a document fetch query

query_str()

Initialize a query with a specified query string

queryable_fields()

List of queryable fields

range_gap()

Specify a 'gap' parameter for facet_range queries

run()

Execute a query

select_fields()

Specify fields to return in the results

selectable_fields()

Valid fields that can be selected

sort_by()

Specify field to sort on

valid_categories()

Get a vector of all unique "category" values

valid_countries()

Get a vector of all unique "country" values

valid_duplicate()

Get a vector of all unique "duplicate" values

valid_languages()

Get a vector of all unique "language" values

valid_quotecategory()

Get a vector of all unique "quotecategory" values

valid_sources()

Get a vector of all unique "source" values

write_docs_csv()

Write xml documents to a csv file

xml_to_list()

Convert Finder xml result into a more convenient R list format
